title: Changed my mind this season is the best of all ! I now see the positive things !
body:
I think the actual state of the game is not bad at all! 

Games aren't too long. I even have the time to watch videos when im dead as it happens a lot these days. With this new kind of approach you have the time to do other things while playing league : that's a good thing. 

A big plus is how nice this game is to improves  the speed of your hands. Now that you have to click faster than your opponent it helps me for the guitar playing. YEP improving your speed ! Thanks a lot riot !

Before i used to play every champion of the game oh boy oh boy i was so dumb... Now i understand that there is only 10 champions to master to enjoy a successful game. I main them now and wreck asses !

With the turrets it's not that bad i can even /dance under turret to taunt my lovely opponents while my supp takes the kills with his insane damage ! MAN now i have my T spell : unleash the supp for the kill !!!!! YEAH you wont FARM opponent ADC !!!! 

I'm so happy with creeps. I trained my self to block them to make a kind of wall of china creeps to trap my opponents inside. Creeps are so efficient those days !!! Be friend with them !

With the new crits items it changed my assassin life. Usually when i played talon against malphite it was like trying to destroy a mountain with a spoon. But now with this new IE the longswords  are usefull against armor ! Malphite now looks like a pile of shit to me... Who cares about tanks anyways ? they are boring as fuck... The concept of malphite and his armor it passive was made by a braindead idiot. I'm so happy i can roll on them however it's not as easy as against other characters tanks always need 3-4 hits compared to the others... still a lot of work, it tires me...

ANd tanks are so boring... Now when i'm bored i challenge myself to play them Full ad or AP its not that bad. And i laugh a lot watching allys and opponents flaming me because of this. 

the best part is that now you can play everything on bot. And adc are so squishy. Oh boy Oh boy when they meet Wizard Malphite with its Friendu Wind CUT YAsuo ITZ party time !!!

I throw rocks at them because adc are bad and they need to be removed from the game !
tanks too cause they are boring...

When i want to pee on my opponents and feel like a GOD i just need to do some things. NOW ITS WAY EASIER TO FEEL GOD LIKEE HAHAHAHA

step 1 : Play Yi
Step 2 : Buy Guinso
Step 3 : ask your worst mate to play taric
Step 4 : shit on them
Step 5 : Be toxic with your oppoents
Step 6 : win the game

Alternative : PLAY SINGED or TALON

When i play singed i feel that my supposedely german ancestors that could possibily not exist  are proud of me. The ennemies follow me braindead like if i was a nude angelina jolie or megan fox runing in the hoods. I feel so good seing them melting. satisfaction is a synonyme of singed ! 

I wanted to leave but this season changed my life i will stay PLEASE continue Those changes i like it. Like when i do bdsm with evelyn... YEAH so evily and painly satisfying !

Keep it UP RIOT and BIG GG ! love you guys !
